title: Massive FPS Lag from NIdalee
body: When playing against a Nidalee the first time she is seen all of my team had a massive frame drop which is very unfair. i think it'd be appropriate to disable her until this is fixed

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry to hear this is happening. Could you please [run a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) on your client and let me know if this helps as issues such as these can be caused by corrupt models.

Could you also check that your system meets the minimum or recommended specs to run league at minimal settings, these can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements).
My PC is very high spec and runs league at max settings at around 200fps so that is out of the question. i dont feel like it is only my client as it was happening to my entire team.

I have tested this in a custom game and am not experiencing any significant frame drops related to Nidalee on my client.

Has this occurred to you since?
Have you repaired your client as linked in the above post?
it looks like it only happened that one game and im not sure why. it stopped happening without a client repair. i feel like it should be looked into but for the time being it has not happened again.
That is definitely strange, oh well. Seems to have resolved itself.
